text: Roman Popov (; born 29 June 1995 in Mykolaiv, Ukraine) is a Ukrainian football midfielder who plays for Chornomorets Odesa. Popov is product of MFC Mykolaiv youth team system. His first trainer was Serhiy Burymenko. He made his debut for Metalurh Zaporizhya in the Ukrainian Premier League in a match against FC Dynamo Kyiv on 30 May 2015. ==References == ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:MFC Mykolaiv players Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Zirka Kropyvnytskyi players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Roman Popov (footballer)
